snippet: In his effort to overhaul the board of Yahoo, the head of Third Point, Daniel S. Loeb, has started his own Web site that features information on his coming proxy fight.
abstract: In his effort to overhaul the board of Yahoo, the head of Third Point, Daniel S. Loeb, has started his own Web site that features information on his coming proxy fight.

headline.main: Loeb Tries to Win a Yahoo Proxy Battle, One Blog Post at a Time
